item.title: Natural Language Processing Terms
item.description: Natural Language Processing with Python is a great entry level book for NLP. I record all basic concepts occurred in this book for reviewing. All codes are written in Python 3. I will keep updating it. Token A token is the technical name for a sequence of characters, such as hairy, his or :), that we want to treat as a group. A word token is a particular appearance of a given word in a text.
